cast.overview: Two FBI agent brothers, Marcus and Kevin Copeland, accidentally foil a drug bust. To avoid being fired they accept a mission escorting a pair of socialites to the Hamptons--but when the girls are disfigured in a car accident, they refuse to go. Left without options, Marcus and Kevin decide to pose as the sisters, transforming themselves from black men into rich white women.
cast.title: White Chicks

details.biography: Melissa Panton (January 30, 1976, in British Columbia, Canada) is a Canadian actress, talent agent, and manager. She appeared in films such as White Chicks (2004) and Repo! The Genetic Opera (2008). In addition to her acting career, she is a partner and agency director at da Costa Talent Vancouver, where she heads the film, television, and voice-over department. She started her career as a professional performer and gained experience in production, casting, and event management.
details.name: Melissa Panton
